Html: When I tried to install Drop 9, it said it was not a valid win32 application.  I tried this on 2 computers.  I tried to install just by clicking on the exe from windows explorer, and I also tried to install it by using Run As.  I am using WIndows XP Pro.

Hi,

The version updated in Oct 6th (today) works on 64-bit systems. I downloaded and tried it, and found no issues.

Could you please try to download it again?

The release notes mentioned this problem.

Hope this helps.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
I downloaded the source again (Oct 6th) and I still have the same issue.
I'm having the same issue also.  Win XP 32-bit.

Hi,

The product team has refreshed the drop 9 download (Prismv4.Drop9.Source.2.exe). From the release notes: the 32-bit and Windows XP issues that were reported below have been addressed.

Fernando Antivero 
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero

Works. Thanks!Â  -- Mike
